## Matrix.setRowFromFloats() method

Sets the index-th row of the current matrix with the given 4 x float values

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setRowFromFloats(index: number, x: number, y: number, z: number, w: number): Matrix;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  index | <code>number</code> | defines the row index |
|  x | <code>number</code> | defines the x component to set |
|  y | <code>number</code> | defines the y component to set |
|  z | <code>number</code> | defines the z component to set |
|  w | <code>number</code> | defines the w component to set |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Matrix`

the updated current matrix
